mapper.insert: insert into PetHotelReservation (phr_num, c_num,p_num, ph_num, phr_chkin, phr_chkout, phrm_num, phr_message, phr_price, phr_totalDays, phr_purpose, phr_imp_uid, phr_merchant_uid, phr_status) values (pethotelreservation_seq.nextval, #{c_num}, #{p_num}, #{ph_num}, #{phr_chkin}, #{phr_chkout},#{phrm_num},#{phr_message}, #{phr_price},#{phr_totalDays},#{phr_purpose},#{phr_imp_uid},#{phr_merchant_uid},#{phr_status} )
mapper.select: select * from PetHotelReservation where p_num = #{p_num} and #{phr_chkin} between phr_chkin and phr_chkout-1 and #{phr_chkout} between phr_chkin and phr_chkout
select ph.ph_name, phr.* from pethotel ph, (select * from pethotelreservation where c_num = #{c_num}) phr where phr.ph_num = ph.ph_num
